title.en: Customizable Layout for Sales Item Configurator

body.en:
Define Your Own Custom Layout for Sales Item Configurator

The Customizable Layout allows administrator to re-organise the product configuration layout information (Group, Sub Group, position of group, subgroup and dynamic attributes) coming from ERP/IMC model (SSC/ IMC configurable product, Classified product).

 

New UI controls for Configurator ( also includes the all new Fluid Layout View )

Select the control that you want to use per characteristic. For certain characteristics, you may want to show all options upfront instead of a dropdown. Now you can have it.

 

Illustration of the new controls in Configurator - 

 

 

By enabling Fluid Layout View, you're able to see more attributes at a glance. Each UI control's width will adapt to the length of the values.
